item.title: 斯里兰卡总统计划启动国际货币基金组织会谈，关注稳定问题
item.description: 斯里兰卡新任总统阿努拉-库马拉-迪萨纳亚克（Anura Kumara Dissanayake）表示，他计划与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）展开讨论，这是他在推出其他举措之前在岛国建立稳定局势的重点工作之一。【原文：Sri Lanka’s new president Anura Kumara Dissanayake said he plans to start discussions with the International Monetary Fund as part of his focus on establishing stability in the island nation before rolling out other initiatives.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利警告好时光已逝，通用汽车和福特汽车下跌
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师亚当-乔纳斯（Adam Jonas）警告说，汽车对美国消费者来说太贵了，而中国的价格战将损害美国的底线，通用汽车公司和福特汽车公司的股价随之下跌。【原文：Shares in General Motors Co. and Ford Motor Co. tumbled after Morgan Stanley analyst Adam Jonas warned that cars are too expensive for US consumers and a price war in China will hurt the bottom line there.】

item.title: 俄罗斯北极油轮运输量创历史新高
item.description: 今年，俄罗斯已经通过北极圈内的北极段运送了创纪录数量的石油，加快了在环境敏感地区向中国运送货物的速度。【原文：Russia has already dispatched a record amount of oil through its section of the Arctic Circle this year, expediting cargo deliveries to China in what is an environmentally sensitive area.】

item.title: 利盟所有者考虑以 20 亿美元出售打印机制造商
item.description: 据知情人士透露，利盟国际公司（Lexmark International Inc.【原文：Lexmark International Inc.’s owners are considering a sale of the laser printer maker, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 阿提哈德航空在飞机延误中改装老旧波音飞机
item.description: 阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways）计划为出库的波音公司 777 飞机改装新的内饰，因为这家阿布扎比航空公司希望在新飞机短缺的情况下利用日益增长的旅行需求。【原文：Etihad Airways plans to retrofit Boeing Co. 777 aircraft brought out of storage with new interiors, as the Abu Dhabi carrier seeks to capitalize on growing travel demand amid a shortage of new jets.】

item.title: 英国脱欧支持者戈夫将主编 "保守党圣经"《旁观者》杂志
item.description: 在对冲基金经理保罗-马歇尔（Paul Marshall）同意以 1 亿英镑（约合 1.31 亿美元）的价格收购这份在政治上颇具影响力的英国杂志不到一个月后，前保守党大臣迈克尔-戈夫（Michael Gove）被任命为《旁观者》杂志的新任编辑。【原文：Former Conservative minister Michael Gove has been named as the new editor of The Spectator, less than a month after hedge fund manager Paul Marshall agreed to buy the politically influential British magazine for £100 million ($131 million).】

item.title: 乐观情绪回升，欧洲房东转向股票市场
item.description: 欧洲房地产公司今年已通过股票发行筹集了 56 亿美元，因为业主们正准备加强其财务状况。【原文：Europe’s real estate firms have raised $5.6 billion this year via equity offerings as landlords gear up to bolster their finances.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国的潜在 "最佳季度 "提高了人们的预期
item.description: 随着特斯拉公司可能在中国市场创下 "有史以来最好的一个季度"，华尔街专业人士纷纷上调对这家电动汽车制造商季度销售额的预期。【原文：With Tesla Inc. possibly looking at its “best quarter ever” in China, Wall Street pros are rushing to increase their outlooks for the electric-vehicle maker’s quarterly sales.】

item.title: Rippling 推出基于人工智能的员工绩效评估工具
item.description:
商业软件初创公司探索客户使用人工智能的方式

【原文：

Business software startup exploring ways customers will use artificial intelligence

】

item.title: 价值 6.3 万亿美元的货币市场行业刚刚迎来首只 ETF
item.description: 一个新的交易所交易基金将于本周三推出，试图从传统货币市场基金的 6.3 万亿美元中分一杯羹。【原文：A new exchange-traded fund attempting to carve out a slice of the $6.3 trillion sitting in traditional money-market funds is launching Wednesday.】

item.title: 捷克在通胀放缓、增长乏力的情况下再次降息
item.description: 随着欧盟国家通胀风险的消退和经济增长前景的恶化，捷克共和国将利率降至近三年来的最低水平。【原文：The Czech Republic cut interest rates to the lowest level in nearly three years as inflationary risks in the European Union nation fade and the outlook for economic growth worsens.】

item.title: 墨西哥议员支持军方接管国民警卫队
item.description: 墨西哥参议院通过了安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔总统将国民警卫队置于军方指挥之下的计划，推翻了有关该计划将赋予武装部队过大权力的警告。【原文：Mexico’s senate passed President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador’s plan to bring the National Guard under military command, shrugging off warnings that it will give the armed forces excessive power.】

item.title: 格鲁吉亚议长谴责美国对总理的冷落
item.description: 格鲁吉亚议会议长说，美国已撤回邀请总理出席乔-拜登总统举办的招待会的邀请，并称此举是对黑海国家内政的干涉。【原文：Georgia’s parliamentary speaker said the US had withdrawn an invitation for the premier to attend a reception hosted by President Joe Biden, branding the move as interference in the Black Sea nation’s internal affairs.】

item.title: 丹格特寻求效仿安巴尼，重新部署炼油厂利润
item.description: 阿利科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）表示，他计划效仿同为亿万富翁的穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani），将非洲最大炼油厂的利润投资到另一个领域，此前他曾不顾警告，建成了这座大型燃料厂。【原文：Aliko Dangote said he plans to emulate fellow billionaire Mukesh Ambani and invest the profits from Africa’s biggest refinery into yet another sector after defying warnings and completing the mega fuel plant.】

item.title: 据称肯尼亚正在洽谈 15 亿美元的阿布扎比融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，肯尼亚正在商谈从阿布扎比贷款 15 亿美元，以帮助弥补这个东非国家的预算资金缺口。【原文：Kenya is in talks for a $1.5 billion loan from Abu Dhabi to help bridge the East African nation’s budget-financing gap, according to people with knowledge of the plans.】

item.title: 谷歌指责微软滥用云计算领域的主导地位
item.description: 谷歌与微软公司就利润丰厚的云计算市场展开了激烈的法律争斗，谷歌在向欧盟反垄断监督机构提交的一份正式申诉中指责美国软件巨头滥用其市场支配地位。【原文：Google has ramped up a legal squabble with Microsoft Corp. over the lucrative cloud market, accusing the US software giant of abusing its market dominance in a formal complaint to the European Union’s antitrust watchdog.】

item.title: 谷歌首席执行官称反垄断审判可能持续多年
item.description: Alphabet Inc.首席执行官桑达尔-皮查伊（Sundar Pichai）表示，解决谷歌的反垄断斗争将需要很多年的时间，他淡化了这些斗争会对公司业务构成直接威胁的说法。【原文：Alphabet Inc. Chief Executive Officer Sundar Pichai said it will take many years to resolve Google’s antitrust battles, downplaying the idea that they pose an immediate threat to the company’s business.】

item.title: 在线假日消费预计增长 8.4%，创 2021 年以来最大增幅
item.description: 据 Adobe 公司称，大幅折扣和通胀缓解将迫使美国购物者在 11 月和 12 月在线消费 2408 亿美元，比去年假日购物季增长 8.4%，是自 2021 年以来的最大增幅。【原文：Steep discounts and easing inflation will compel US shoppers to spend $240.8 billion online in November and December, up 8.4% from last year’s holiday shopping season and the biggest increase since 2021, according to Adobe Inc.】

item.title: 煤炭暴利暴露中国钢铁之痛
item.description:
北京对廉价蒙古供应品的抢购说明了该行业面临的压力。【原文：

Beijing’s rush for cheap Mongolian supplies speaks to an industry under pressure.

】

item.title: 苏格兰法院同意审理罗斯班克油田气候案
item.description: 爱丁堡最高民事法庭已同意听取气候运动人士以气候为由要求阻止北海罗斯班克（Rosebank）油气开发项目的辩论。【原文：The Court of Session in Edinburgh has agreed to hear arguments brought by climate campaigners seeking to block the Rosebank oil and gas development in the North Sea on climate grounds.】

item.title: 私募股权基金请来专家修复卖不掉的公司
item.description: 重量级收购公司越来越多地采用老式的赚钱方式，即实际经营他们收购的公司。【原文：Buyout heavyweights are increasingly resorting to the old-fashioned way of making money — actually running the companies they’ve bought.】

item.title: 经合组织称德国必须 "回归改革 "以提振经济
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）首席经济学家阿尔瓦罗-桑托斯-佩雷拉（Alvaro Santos Pereira）认为，德国需要进行改革，以改善竞争和减少官僚主义，从而帮助启动欧洲最大的经济体。【原文：Germany needs to carry out reforms to improve competition and cut bureaucracy in order to help kickstart Europe’s biggest economy, according to OECD Chief Economist Alvaro Santos Pereira.】

item.title: 美光公司业绩或显示人工智能赢家正在折价交易
item.description: 美光科技公司可能会成为最新一家向投资者保证人工智能相关设备需求依然强劲的芯片制造商。与许多同行一样，美光也可能承认，个人电脑和智能手机等其他主要领域的需求依然低迷。【原文：Micron Technology Inc. will probably become the latest chipmaker to assure investors that demand for AI-related gear is still strong. Like many peers, it may also admit that other staple areas of demand such as PCs and smartphones remain in the doldrums.】

item.title: Meta 推出 VR 十年后仍在为 Quest 寻求受众
item.description: 十年过去了，Meta 公司仍在试图让我们相信虚拟现实是未来的趋势。但首先...【原文：Ten years in, Meta is still trying to convince us that virtual reality is the future. But first...】

item.title: 两年前，这款相机风靡全球。你仍然买不到
item.description:
TikTok 对富士 X100V 的喜爱为这家日本公司带来了丰厚的利润，而这家公司最初在数字时代的竞争中举步维艰。【原文：

TikTok’s love of the Fujifilm X100V has driven big profits for the Japanese company, which initially struggled to compete in the digital era.

】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率再次下降，引发再融资大潮
item.description: 随着越来越多的美国人利用两年来最低廉的借贷成本，抵押贷款再融资申请连续第二周激增。【原文：Applications to refinance mortgages surged for a second week as more Americans capitalized on the cheapest borrowing costs in two years.】

item.title: 邦吉拯救巨型大豆供应商之举取决于阿根廷法院
item.description: 阿根廷最高法院将决定是否允许农作物巨头邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）和维特拉公司（Viterra Inc.【原文：A top court in Argentina is set to decide whether crop giants Bunge Global SA and Viterra Inc. will be allowed to take over a company that was once the crown jewel of the country’s massive soybean-processing industry.】

item.title: Reddit 聘用前谷歌广告高管推动小型企业发展
item.description: Reddit 公司正在聘请前谷歌广告高管迈克-罗莫夫（Mike Romoff）担任首席营收官，这是该社交媒体公司为接触更多广告客户而采取的举措之一。【原文：Reddit Inc. is hiring former Google advertising executive Mike Romoff as chief revenue officer, part of a push by the social media company to reach a wider range of ad clients.】

item.title: 中国为欧洲疲软的大宗商品股提供脆弱的生命线
item.description: 人们已经开始担心，本周受中国刺激措施刺激的欧洲商品股涨势可能不会持久。【原文：There are already concerns that this week’s rally in European commodity stocks, spurred by Chinese stimulus measures, may not last.】

item.title: 越南总理瞄准外国直接投资，资助人工智能和大数据发展
item.description: 越南总理范明正誓言要通过降低物流成本和改善基础设施，吸引 "至关重要的 "外国投资进入人工智能开发领域，因为越南正努力将自己打造成全球先进技术中心。【原文：Vietnam’s Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh vowed to lure “crucial” foreign investment into AI development by cutting logistics costs and improving infrastructure, as the country seeks to establish itself as a global hub for advanced technology.】
